description:
Shenhe is a Cryo character with a complex kit that has strong buffing capabilities, with the ability to increase the damage dealt by Cryo characters. She is generally played as the second Cryo character in Freeze teams and is currently the best enabler for a "Mono Cryo" team due to her Cryo focused buffs and decent particle generation. Shenhe is also viable in Physical and Melt teams.

**Kit Breakdown**
Her Elemental Burst reduces enemy Cryo & Physical RES, gives a Cryo DMG Bonus to the on-field character and deals periodic Cryo damage. It is her main way of triggering her own Quills from her Elemental Skill. It is the majority of her damage output and has strong buffs, so it is worth building enough Energy Recharge to burst consistently, even at the cost of some ATK.

Her Elemental Skill generates [5-7] Quills that buff instances of Cryo damage dealt by each member of the team based on her total ATK, counted separately per member. With her Ascension 4 passive, this ability also increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG or Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG* for a short period of time.

Both these abilities let her bring a lot to the table for team compositions with Cryo team members.

[*] - Depends on if skill is tapped or held.
For an in depth breakdown of Shenhe's usage, check out the KQM guide linked below!
